There were, however, very few convictions actually specifically punishing these relationships between women. When that happened it was usually because there was a case of alleged witchcraft, of demonesses, as we saw. But this is interesting because it was considered that the really serious cases were where the women had used some kind of sexual instrument during the relations, which could be, and this is specified in laws and edicts, could be leather, could be wood, could be glass, could be any other material.
